page.title: 19HOME LIFE IN AMPFIELD
page.content: The Permain family have lived in Ampfield for over a year.They have a child called Natalie,aged 6,who goes to our school,Sherborne House in Chandler's Ford which is a preparatory schools for girls from 3 to 11 and boys from 3 to 8.Natalie is in class _ Transition with 22 other children . She starts at 9.15am. and finishes at 3.30pm.Her hobbies are{ballet}which she takes after school on a Tuesday until 4.30pm.She also enjoys riding which she does near her home. Natalie belongs to the Sunday Club for young children held at St.Matks Church.She has 2 cats called Lucy and Coco. Mrs. Permain enjoys tapestry and cooking and belongs to the W.I. which is a women's club in Ampfield.
